description: Meet Faith; naturally pretty, only 19 years old and fairly new to bondage. She thinks she's pretty tough and says she loves the loss of control that come with tight ropes on her skin. She likes to struggle and act as if she doesn't like it, but her powerful orgasms tell a different story. The fishtank is a challenge, being forefully dunked is always hard but when it's all over she's all smiles and can't wait to come back and do it again!!
title: Wolf Lotus and Faith Leon
